articles.title: KCNA Detailed Report on Truth about Crimes Committed by American Journalists
articles.content:
KCNA Detailed Report on Truth about Crimes Committed by American Journalists
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency on Tuesday released a detailed report laying bare the facts about the crimes committed by the American journalists who were arrested for having illegally trespassed into the border of the DPRK and committed hostile acts against it for which they were tried.
					 According to it, at dawn of March 17 unidentified two men and two women covertly crossed the River Tuman to intrude into its bank of the DPRK side in Kangan-ri, Onsong County, North Hamgyong Province. The two women were arrested on the spot. 
					
					 The arrestees were confirmed to be Chinese-American Laura Ling, 32, correspondent of the Current TV, and south Korean-American Seung-Un Lee, 36, editor of the Current TV.
					
					 The investigation proved that the intruders crossed the border and committed the crime for the purpose of making animation files to be used for an anti-DPRK smear campaign over its human rights issue.
					
					 The preliminary investigation proved that they had a confab on producing and broadcasting a documentary slandering the DPRK with Mitch Koss, executive producer of programming of the Current TV, David Neuman, president of programming, and David Harleston, head of the Legal Department of Current TV, and other men in Los Angeles, U.S. in January.
					
					 A trial of the accused was held at the Pyongyang City Court from June 4 to 8.
					
					 At the trial the accused admitted that what they did were criminal acts committed, prompted by the political motive to isolate and stifle the socialist system of the DPRK by faking up moving images aimed at falsifying its human rights performance and hurling slanders and calumnies at it. 
					
					 In the name of the DPRK the Central Court determined ten years of hard labor according to Provision 69 of the Criminal Code and four years of hard labor according to Provision 233 of the Criminal Code for the accused Laura Ling and Seung-Un Lee and sentenced them to 12 years of hard labor according to Provision 44 of the Criminal Code.
					
					 The prison term is counted from March 22, 2009, when the accused were detained and it was pronounced that the judgment is unappealable.
					
					 The criminals admitted and accepted the judgment.
					
					 We are following with a high degree of vigilance the attitude of the U.S. which spawned the criminal act against the DPRK.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The North Side, South Side and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a joint appeal on Monday on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration marked a historic event that demonstrated with pride before the world the resolution of all the Koreans to put an end to the history of division and confrontation that has lasted for more than half a century and usher in a new era of independent and peaceful reunification, the new history of reunification and prosperity, the appeal said.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the north-south summit was provided again in October 2007 and the October 4 declaration was produced, indicating a specific orientation for developing the north-south relations and achieving peace and prosperity in the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 But the north-south joint declarations are negated due to the separatist forces' challenge to deter the history from advancing and their precious fruitions are gravely threatened and the military confrontation has reached an acute phase, the appeal said, calling for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and protecting peace from confrontation and war and urging all the Koreans at home and abroad to achieve firm unity under the banner of the north-south joint declarations. It continued:
					
					 We declare the period from June 15, the anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration, to October 4, the anniversary of the adoption of the October 4 declaration, as a "period of the movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration."
					
					 It is necessary to thoroughly check the anti-reunification and bellicose forces' arms buildup and war moves as they increase the danger of a war on this land.
					
					 Let us launch a dynamic mass struggle against Japan's hostile act and its moves for the revival of militarism with the 64th anniversary of the liberation of Korea, the 80th anniversary of the Kwangju student incident and the 99th anniversary of the fabrication of "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty," etc. as a momentum!
					
					 Let us weather the prevailing difficulties and more dynamically advance the June 15 era in firm unity irrespective of partisan interests, strata, region and affiliation!
					
					 Let all of us turn out in implementing the north-south joint declaration with optimism and confidence in the nation's reconciliation, peace, reunification and prosperity!
					
					 Saying that we will greet the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration next year, the appeal called upon all the Koreans at home and abroad to significantly greet the day with a shining victory in the patriotic struggle for reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Disallowing Religious Group's Pyongyang Visit
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Disallowing Religious Group's Pyongyang Visit
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak recently took a fascist action to disallow the Pyongyang visit of pilgrims' group "Ochetuji." The group originally planned to hold prayers' meeting for reunification at Pohyon Temple in Mt. Myohyang on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The Religious Believers Council of Korea issued a statement Tuesday denouncing this.
					
					 The statement vehemently denounced the Lee group of traitors as a group of Satans as it has reduced the south Korean society to a graveyard of democracy and human rights and driven the people's livelihood into unbearable destitution while laying hurdles in the way of national reconciliation and unity and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 As far as the pilgrim made by office-bearers of the Catholic Priests' Council for Justice and the Solidarity of Buddhist Environment and people from all walks of life is concerned, it was a protest staged, unable to remain a passive onlooker to the gloomy reality of the society where the trend of the June 15 era of reunification is completely stemmed by the Lee Myung Bak group, justice, democracy and patriotism are cruelly violated at the point of bayonet under dictatorship and the people's living is deteriorating as the days go by, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The above-said action taken by the Lee group against the religionists conducting patriotic religious activities clearly proves that the group is only seeking to prolong the remaining days of its reactionary conservative regime through fascist dictatorship, in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation and the existence of the nation and its peace, etc.
					
					 Nothing can calm down the surging storm for punishing the group of Lee as it has brought only disaster and misfortune to the compatriots by perpetrating evils against the people and the nation since its seizure of power and this storm will bring the group to self-destruction. 
					
					 The statement expressed the expectation that the religionists of south Korea would carry forward their tradition of having taken the lead in the struggle for justice, truth, peace and reunification and positively turn out in the nationwide struggle to throw overboard the Lee group of traitors at an early date and make a new history of independent reunification and peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students and members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea were held in the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Tower of the Juche Idea on Tuesday to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Reports and speeches were made there.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK, 45 years ago marked an event of special mention as it promised a bright future of the country and people, adding that the WPK has brought about great changes in all domains of the revolution and construction under his leadership.
					
					 Referring to the fact that Kim Jong Il has upheld and preserved President Kim Il Sung's idea of party building and exploits he performed in it, developed the WPK into the Party of the President and consolidated as firm as a rock the single-minded unity of the leader and the party, the army and the people based on the Juche idea and Songun idea, they went on:
					
					 The exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by firmly defending the country, the revolution and socialism and bringing a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation to this land will shine forever.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has always indicated the ways for the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea to follow, training the youth as reliable successors to the Songun revolution and leading with warm loving care the women's union to become a mass political organization in the era of Songun.
					
					 They called upon all young people and members of the women's union to perform commendable feats in the on-going general march, firmly convinced that eternal prosperity is in store for Kim Il Sung's nation thanks to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: "World Blood Donor Day" Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
"World Blood Donor Day" Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- An event was held in the DPRK on June 15 to mark the "World Blood Donor Day" (June 14).
					 Participating in the event were officials working in the field of public health, voluntary non-remunerated blood donors and foreigners.
					
					 Ri Pong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, said in the opening ceremony that successful blood transfusion can be guaranteed only when men and women donate their blood to the society and people of their own accord and elaborated the problems of increasing the number of regular voluntary non-remunerated blood donors.
					
					 His speech was followed by the speeches of the acting representative of the World Health Organization here and the representative to the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies active in the country.
					
					 Participants looked round a photo and visual-aids show on blood transfusion and the inside of the newly reconstructed National Blood Center before appreciating an art performance.
					
					 The "World Blood Donor Day" was observed in different parts of the country.
					
					 Various information activities were conducted on the occasion in the country in accordance with the theme for this year "Achieving 100 % Voluntary Non-Remunerated Donation of Blood and Blood Products!"

articles.title: Chollima Soaring High up to Sky
articles.content:
Chollima Soaring High up to Sky
						
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Chollima (winged horse) Statue is still shining along with the heroic features of the Korean people who are striving hard to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation though much water has flown under the bridge since it was constructed on Mansu Hill near  Moran Hill, Pyongyang.
					 The statue is composed of bronze effigies of a worker with a letter of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in his raised hand and a peasant woman seated behind him with a sheaf of ripe rice in her arms, soaring sky-high on the horseback, and the white-grey granite pedestal.
					
					 The statue shows intensively the history of leap forward created by the Chollima riders after the Korean war.
					
					 Upholding President Kim Il Sung's far-reaching plan of building a rich and powerful country, they produced 120,000 tons of steel billets from a blooming mill with a rated capacity of 60,000 tons and 270,000 tons of pig irons from a furnace with an annual rated capacity of 190,000 tons and manufactured a lorry and a tractor in 30 to 40 days for the first time in the country.
					
					 They also laid the Haeju-Hasong railway line, more than 80 kilometers long, in 75 days and created a startling "Pyongyang Speed" by which a flat for one household was assembled within 14 minutes.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited Kangson, the cradle-land of Chollima movement, last year and kindled the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge, saying that the workers of Kangson who have supported the Party with steel whenever difficulties were raised should stand in the van of the new revolutionary upsurge, racing against the time at the speed of Chollima once again.
					
					 The WPK called upon the entire Party, the whole country and all the people to launch the 150-day campaign. In response to the call, the Korean people are exerting all their efforts to create a new norm and a new record in all sectors and all units.
					
					 The legendary Chollima of Korea is galloping sky-high again in the great Songun era.

articles.title: Songun Politics, Most Powerful, Dignified and Independent One
articles.content:
Songun Politics, Most Powerful, Dignified and Independent One
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people are demonstrating their prestige in the international arena as an independent nation thanks to Songun politics.
					Songun politics embodying the Juche idea is the most powerful, dignified and independent one which thoroughly defends the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and reliably guarantees the promotion of the revolution and construction one's own way under any circumstances.
					
					The politics gives foremost priority to the military affairs and to the building of a powerful defense capacity, thus making it possible to safeguard the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation most firmly.
					
					One cannot protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation without a powerful military strength today when the imperialists are engrossed in strong-arm politics and high-handedness everywhere in the world in an attempt to realize their wild dream of world domination by their "policy of strength".
					
					Having built a powerful defense capability under Songun politics, the Korean people are reliably defending their sovereignty and prestige from the anti-DPRK confrontation and incessant new war provocation moves of the bellicose forces which gravely jeopardize the sovereignty and territorial integrity, peace and security of the country.
					
					  Songun politics enables one to advance the revolution and construction in one's own way by remarkably increasing the internal force of the revolution with the revolutionary army as the main.
					
					In order to solve all problems in accordance with one's independent idea and judgment, in reliance upon the strength of one's people and in suit with the interests of one's people and the actual conditions of the country under the grave situation in which the imperialists persist in threat, blackmail and appeasement, it is imperative to have a powerful internal force of the revolution.
					
					The world history has witnessed not once or twice the facts that some countries, without their own firm internal force of revolution, fail to keep the principle and consistency while reading other's faces and make a mess of the revolution and construction in the long run.
					
					Thanks to the strongest unity and cohesion of the leader, Party, army and people achieved under Songun politics, the Korean people have become able to carry on all the work in accordance with their determination and self-confidence without being restricted by anything, determinedly frustrating all manner of interference and pressure of the imperialist forces.
					
					The Korean people regard it as due obligation and pride to defend and follow Songun politics, the invincible might.

articles.title: Clairvoyant Wisdom
articles.content:
Clairvoyant Wisdom
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il summoned hastily an official on a summer day in Juche 56 (1967).
					A prolonged drought rare to be seen plagued Korea at that time.
					
					The official felt strained, thinking that he would be given precious instructions related with drought damage.
					
					He took emergency measures to prevent flood damage, saying there was little problem for the country in agriculture regarding drought with its well developed irrigation and it was urgent to prevent possible damage from torrential rains following drought.
					
					Some officials may ask why we should be worried about rains when the sky is blue, he said, adding: But it is woefully wrong to think that way and we should set about a campaign to prevent flood damage without delay.
					
					The official was moved to the depths of his being.
					
					It was a marvelous thing unknown in history to take measures against damage from heavy rains, not measures to tide over drought when a long dry spell hit the country. 
					
					A brisk campaign to prevent flood damage got under way all over the country according to his emergency measure.
					
					It rained in torrents across the country in late August that year, augmenting the flow of water through the Taedong and other rivers per second above 10,000 tons each up on that in former floods.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is, indeed, a great man with clairvoyant wisdom.

articles.title: U.S. Ambition for World Supremacy Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Ambition for World Supremacy Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. war-hawks have asserted that the establishment of missile defense system should be intensified to cope with increased "missile threat" to the U.S. from "rogue states". Such brigandish and preposterous sophism can work on nobody.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. is putting spurs to the establishment of MD while spreading the rumor about "missile threat" like a thief crying "Stop the thief". This is aimed to have an absolutely military strategic edge with the capacity for preemptive missile attack and thus make military deterrent of other countries ineffective in a bid to realize its world strategy for supremacy.
					
					 The U.S. would assert that its establishment of MD is for "defense," but it is, in essence, designed to cover the world with missile defense network and mount preemptive missile attack on any regions and countries anytime.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that it is the invariable intention and strategy of the U.S. to keep its hegemonic position and hold sway over the world by strength, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The danger of new arms race and nuclear showdown is now prevailing in the world and global peace and security are being exposed to serious threat by such military reinforcement as the U.S. frantic MD establishment being intensified under the pretext of coping with "missile threat" from someone.
					
					 The facts clearly show that though it is talking about "peace" and "disarmament", the U.S. is not "defender of peace" but wrecker of peace and the very one responsible for the nuclear threat and proliferation and arms race.
					
					 The U.S. can never cover up its true colors as an aggressor though it is craftily working to conceal the aggressive nature of the MD establishment and justify it. The U.S. imperialist war-hawks had better stop at once the criminal buildup of missile armed forces aimed at harassing the world strategic stability and sparking off a new arms race and a nuclear war.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Gang's Outbursts Agitating War Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Gang's Outbursts Agitating War Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, recently inspecting the "air force operational command" in Osan, Kyonggi Province, for the purpose of examining the puppet army's "combat posture", let loose sheer sophism that "cooperation with the U.S. would help deter a war". A few days later, he invited brasshats of the U.S. forces in south Korea and their wives to "Chongwadae" where he trumpeted about "close cooperation" and "contribution to peace and stability".
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes:
					
					 Such warlike remarks can be uttered only by the traitor serving the U.S. and confrontational maniac keen on covering up the essence of south Korea-U.S. "alliance" for aggression and war and pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war at any cost in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 The danger of a war is prevailing on the peninsula because the U.S. put south Korea under its military occupation and worked hard to invade the DPRK in conspiracy with the south Korean puppets.
					
					 Had the south Korean authorities not "tightened alliance" with the U.S. and persisted in the reckless racket for confrontation with the DPRK, the north-south relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula would have not reached the present catastrophe.
					
					 It is needless to say that the "alliance" with the U.S. touted by the traitor is, in essence, one for a war of aggression to bring down the DPRK through military conspiracy between the U.S. and the south Korean puppets.
					
					 The group of traitors is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can threaten the DPRK through the "tightened alliance" with its American master and bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The group's reckless act of staking its fate on "tightened alliance" with outsiders will only invite bitter defeat and shameful destruction.
					
					 Regret always comes late. The traitor had better bear this stern warning of the DPRK deep in mind.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's War Moves Censured
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's War Moves Censured
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet military warmongers visited puppet army units on the forefront area to incite the fever of war against the DPRK, calling for "perfect alert readiness" and "victorious conclusion." Meanwhile, they are massively opening to the media the DPRK-targeted war exercises and arms and other war equipment of the three services of the south Korean puppet armed forces.
					 Commenting on such moves, Minju Joson today says that they are a revelation of the Lee Myung Bak group's wicked design to ignite a war against the DPRK at any cost by getting on its nerves and rendering the situation extremely tense.
					
					 Unpredictable and very dangerous situation is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula, the commentary notes, and cites data to disclose that the U.S. and the Lee group are the very ones responsible for this serious situation arousing deep apprehension from among the people at home and abroad.
					
					 Through military provocative moves, the Lee group of traitors is seeking to quell the anti-"government" sentiment daily growing among the south Korean people and tide over the serious ruling crisis and, at the same time, round off the more perfect preparedness to cope with military conflicts aimed at invasion of the DPRK, it points out, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group is a gang of die-hard confrontational maniacs and traitors to the nation. Anyhow, the group's scheme to save itself from the ruling crisis through moves to provoke a war can never be a proper solution. Such tactics does work no longer, and this will only precipitate the group's self-destruction. The only way out is to follow the mindset of the population. The Lee group should meet the demand of the people urging it to step down at once, far from resorting to futile war moves against the DPRK to while away the time. This will be the wisest behavior for the group.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Turn Japan into Military Power Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Moves to Turn Japan into Military Power Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are now busy with the moves to have the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" allowed, the "three principles of arms export" reexamined and  "acquire the capability to attack enemy bases" and study and develop a satellite aimed at gathering intelligence, etc. These developments are a vivid manifestation of the moves for turning Japan into a military giant that have reached a serious phase.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It cites facts to prove that Japan has worked in real earnest to build offensive forces for reinvasion since the demise of the Cold War, openly revealing its militarist nature. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the sinister intention and strategic goal of the Japanese reactionaries to establish military hegemony after turning the land, seas and space into huge military bases.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that Japan is now keen to build up its offensive forces in a craftier manner, not content with having turned itself into a force of aggression and a war state equipped with the perfect modern offensive forces system.
					
					 The Liberal Democratic Party of Japan at a meeting of the panel for the review of the defence policy changed the wording about "enemy base" made in its original proposal into "a strategic base" in a bid to prevent it from being interpreted as Japan's acquisition of its independent offensive capability. In other words, it changed the contents of the proposal to the effect that Japan wishes to acquire the capability to attack strategic bases under the Japan-U.S. cooperation system. This is a revelation of Japan's scenario for reinvasion.
					
					 Such change in the wording can never help alter the aggressive nature and true colors of Japan.
					
					 Such jugglery as burying one's head in the sand like an ostrich can never work in the bright world today.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the Japanese reactionaries to speed up the beefing of modern armed forces under the pretext of "coping with" someone's "military threat" in an effort to convert Japan into a military giant and kick off reinvasion anytime.
					
					 This is, however, as foolish an act as precipitating its self-destruction.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop such suicidal act as jumping into the fire with faggots on its back.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to Dynamically Advance June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to Dynamically Advance June 15 Era of Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad are called upon to meet the challenges of the separatist forces and dynamically advance the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of the north-south joint declaration, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial dedicated to the 9th anniversary of the north-south joint declaration.
					 The adoption of the joint declaration ushered in a new history of the inter-Korean relations guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and miraculous successes unimaginable in the era of confrontation had been made in the movement for national reunification, the editorial notes.
					
					 Hailing the joint declaration as the most valid great programme for reunification common to the nation, it goes on:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration, agreed upon and solemnly declared to the world by the north and the south, serves as an immortal banner for national reunification as it comprises the idea and principle of the past inter-Korean agreements, including the July 4 joint statement.
					
					 The basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration is the idea of "By our nation itself". This idea provides the homogeneous Korean nation that has the history of 5,000 years shining with brilliant culture with ideological and moral source of giving fullest play to the spirit of independence and the will for unity. The joint declaration made the struggle for independence of the nation and its great unity an irreversible trend of the times by instilling the idea of "By our nation itself", the vivid proposition of patriotism, into the hearts of the Koreans. Herein lies the weighty historic significance of the declaration.
					
					 The stand and attitude toward the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are a touchstone distinguishing national independence from dependence on outsiders and reunification from division.
					
					 Independent reunification, peace and prosperity can never be expected without the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The Koreans' cause of national reunification is sure to triumph as long as there are the most just inter-Korean declarations brightly lighting the road ahead of the era of independent reunification and the Songun politics providing reliable guarantee for them and the inexhaustible strength of all Koreans closely rallied in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Withdrawal of Lee Myung Bak's Hostile Policy towards DPRK Urged
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Lee Myung Bak's Hostile Policy towards DPRK Urged
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the Solidarity for Progress, workers, youth and students' organizations and opposition parties held an "all- people rally for commemorating the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration" in Seoul on June 14 to urge the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and implement the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					 Speakers at the rally referred to the dangerous situation on the Korean Peninsula where people can not predict when they will meet a holocaust of war.
					
					 Under this situation people from all walks of life got together to urgently demand the Lee Myung Bak "government" convert its hostile policy towards the DPRK full of confrontation and mistrust into a policy of reconciliation, cooperation and peace, they said.
					
					 Noting that after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime the south-north relations faced a stern trial, they denounced the conservative ruling forces for trying to obliterate the successes achieved in the way for reconciliation and cooperation of the nation, totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak should not foster a crisis, groundlessly taking issue with the DPRK but respect for the south-north joint declarations and clarify his intention to honestly implement them, they stressed.
					
					 They called upon those who ardently desire for national reunification, not for the confrontation and mistrust, to turn out in the struggle for adhering to and implementing the above-mentioned declarations with concerted efforts irrespective of the religious belief, political view and faction.
					
					 On June 13 organizations at all levels including the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress, the Solidarity for Reunification in Seoul, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the preparatory committee for the south Korean Federation of Youth Organizations and opposition parties held a "cultural event for independent reunification" in Seoul.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Urged to Apologize for Brutal Suppression of Protesters
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Urged to Apologize for Brutal Suppression of Protesters
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a press conference on June 12 at which it urged puppet traitor Lee Myung Bak to apologize for prodding the police into mercilessly cracking down upon the participants in the "all-people meeting for inheriting the June resistance and winning back democracy."
					 Then, he opened to the public the photos showing the reckless crackdown perpetrated by fascist policemen on June 10.
					
					 He disclosed that that day policemen dropped shields on protesters and beat them with iron bars and committed merciless violence even against reporters covering the news.
					
					 He charged that Lee was entirely to blame for the recent violence.
					
					 He demanded Lee dismiss all those involved in the recent suppression and promise the people that he would halt the police violence and make a switchover in the "state administration".
					
					 If Lee disregards the nation's resentment once again, the all-people struggle will go on in south Korea, he warned.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference in Seoul on June 12 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					 The KCTU accused the Lee "government" of recently working hard to build up public opinion over "the security crisis" aimed to achieve a political purpose and insisting on the policy of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					  Recalling that the authorities are taking the lead in putting pressure and sanctions on the north, the organization branded this as treachery and a reckless act of posing a threat to the peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It urged the Lee "government" to drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 If the authorities persistently sidestep the demand of the people, the KCTU will turn out in the struggle to force the Lee regime to step down, the organization warned.

articles.title: Candlelight Action for Judging Lee Myung Bak Launched
articles.content:
Candlelight Action for Judging Lee Myung Bak Launched
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The "network of civic and public organizations for defending democracy and checking the suppression under the pretext of security" which groups the human rights, civic and public organizations of south Korea staged a candlelight action in Seoul on June 13 in protest against the suppression by police.
					 The participants accused the riot police hurled to crack down upon the "all-people meeting for inheriting the June resistance and winning back democracy" of dropping shields on the heads and necks of passers-by, firing tear gas at them while indiscriminately arresting and dragging protesters like animals on June 10.
					
					 They disclosed that the riot police made no scruple of suppressing even reporters covering news and a member of "the National Assembly" and used for crackdown even iron truncheons whose use is banned. 
					
					 They charged that the recent police suppression of protesters cannot be construed otherwise than brutal murder.
					
					 There is nothing to change even if the chief of the Police Office is replaced and the representative of the "Grand National Party" is reshuffled, they declared. 
					
					 They called upon the south Korean people to fight just as the resistance fighters did at that time if the Lee Myung Bak "government" brings back the days of the military fascist dictatorial rule.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause Supported by Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause Supported by Int'l Organization
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The 17th congress of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers held in Vietnam from June 6 to 10 extended full support to the just cause of the Korean people.
					 The congress adopted the following "resolution on the peace and peaceful reunification of Korea":
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula where the military confrontation and tension are daily escalating arouses the international community's great concern.
					
					 The movement for Korea's reunification is facing a serious challenge though it had made dynamic progress after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration agreed upon by the top leaders of the north and the south and the inter-Korean relations are in the grip of the worst crisis.
					
					 This is entirely attributable to the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK and the confrontational policy of the south Korean conservative authorities.
					
					 The 17th congress of the International Association of Democratic Lawyers declares as follows, recognizing that the peace, security and reunification of the Korean Peninsula are one of the key issues in defending peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world:
					
					 The U.S. should stop all its hostile acts of threatening the DPRK including war exercises and take the earliest possible measure for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace agreement so as to discontinue laying obstacles in the way of realizing the peace, security and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should give up sycophancy towards the U.S. and the idea of inter-Korean confrontation and stop suppressing the pro-reunification progressive forces in south Korea and refrain from any act obstructive to the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and the solution of the issue of the reunification of Korea.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve national reconciliation and unity and reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed by Overseas Koreans Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed by Overseas Koreans Organizations
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the General Association of Koreans in China on June 13 to mark the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the association, in a report recalled that Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and a revolutionary party guided by his revolutionary idea by successfully carrying forward the revolutionary exploits performed by the President generation after generation.
					
					 All the Koreans in China will bear deep in mind the immortal revolutionary history and great exploits of Kim Jong Il and turn out as one in the patriotic movement for the prosperity of the motherland, keeping pace with the people in the DPRK bringing about a new leap forward on all fronts for building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, he added. 
					
					 A meeting of the association was held on the same day to mark the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the association, in a report praised Kim Jong Il for having performed undying exploits to shine long in the history of the movement for national reunification, stressing the need to wage a more dynamic movement for independent reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Letters to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.
					
					 A similar event was held by Korean organizations in the Maritime Territory of Russia at the DPRK Consulate General in Nakhodka on June 11 to mark the above-mentioned anniversaries.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Declarations Supported
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Declarations Supported
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of New Zealand and Egypt issued statements on June 8 to mark the 9th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Don Borrie, chairman of the New Zealand-DPRK Society, said that the joint declaration, adopted on June 15, 2000, opened up a historic chapter in the history of the movement for Korea's reunification.
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 Since the publication of the declaration, epochal measures were taken for implementing it and signal successes made in the course of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration in 2007 was an eye-opening event for peace and prosperity on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 But, the inter-Korean relations developing on good terms have been put on confrontational phase after the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea in 2008.
					
					 The DPRK expressed its will to sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The world peace-loving people are extending full support to the Korean people in the efforts to realize the peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself". 
					
					 Siham Ahmad Mugahed, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, said that Korea's reunification is a problem pertaining to the Korean nation to be solved by the Koreans responsible for it and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are of special significance in doing so.
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration based on the idea of "By our nation itself" was a noteworthy event that brought about a landmark phase in the Korean reunification movement and this declaration serves as a milestone for Korea's reunification, he stressed.
					
					The cause of Korea's reunification is sure to be realized thanks to the strong mainstay of independence provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said, expressing belief that the Korean people will certainly achieve the independent reunification of the country under the banner of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Different Countries
Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, the Socialist Party of Romania, the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea between May 29 and June 5 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the seminars were photos showing the feats of Kim Jong Il and introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					  The chairman of the Information Committee of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia said that 45 years covered by Kim Jong Il are the heroic biography of the prominent great man who has successfully carried forward and developed the cause of President Kim Il Sung and that his method of leadership is to give priority to ideology and solve any problem by dint of ideology.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, noted that in the whole period of leading the WPK Kim Jong Il has always showed deep care for the party work and strengthening of the military capability, true to the cause of Kim Il Sung and wisely led the struggle for defending socialism and building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il ushered in a new era of the Songun revolution with the might of arms by holding the WPK and the army and has won one victory after another by dint of the single-minded unity and ideology. 
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea explained in detail about the feats performed by Kim Jong Il for party building and Songun leadership, stressing that the DPRK's successful satellite launch was a demonstration of its national power.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in France.

articles.title: Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to be Commemorated in Belarus
articles.content:
Centenary of Kim Il Sung's Birth to be Commemorated in Belarus
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A Belorussian national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Minsk on June 10.
					 V. Chikin, chairman of the National Council of the Social Association "for Democracy, Social Progress and Justice" and chairman of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce through media the brilliant revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung and his immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence and hold colorful political and cultural events supporting the just cause of the Korean people who are pushing ahead with the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il till April 2012.

articles.title: ATCC informa en detalles el juicio sobre periodistas norteamericanas
articles.content:
ATCC informa en detalles el juicio sobre periodistas norteamericanas
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea publico este martes la informacion detallada que revela los actos criminales de las periodistas norteamericanas que fueron sometidas al juicio tras ser arrestadas por haber cruzado ilegalmente la frontera de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A la madrugada del 17 de marzo, fueron detenidas en el acto 2 mujeres quienes habian entrado ilegalmente via rio Tuman con otros 2 hombres desconocidos en el lado de la RPDC de este rio en la comuna de Kang-an del distrito de Onsong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Las detenidas son la ciudadana norteamericana de origen chino, Laura Ling con 32 anos de edad, quien trabaja como corresponsal de la Compania "Current TV" de EE.UU. y la otra norteamericana de origen surcoreano Seung-eun Lee con 36 anos de edad que trabaja como editora de la misma compania.
					
					  Segun el resultado de averiguacion, se revelo que las intrusas cruzaron la frontera y perpetraron actos criminales con la meta de sacar el material de video que iba a utilizarse en la campana anti-RPDC en el campo de derechos humanos.
					
					 En el proceso de sumario, quedo confirmado que Laura Ling y Seung-eun Lee debatieron en enero en la ciudad de Los Angeles de EE.UU. el problema de fabricar y transmitir un documental para calumniar a la RPDC junto con Mitch Koss, productor ejecutivo de la programacion de la compania arriba mencionada, David Newman, presidente de programacion, David Harleston, jefe del departamento legal de la misma compania, etc.
					
					 Tuvo lugar del 4 al 8 de junio el proceso sobre las acusadas en el Tribunal de la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					En el juicio, las acusadas reconocieron que sus actos constituyen los crimenes perpetrados a partir del motivo politico de aislar y aplastar nuestro regimen socialista mediante la fabricacion de los materiales de video encaminados a difamar y censurar la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC sin atenerse a la realidad.
					
					En nombre de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Tribunal Central delibero los 10 anos de trabajo reeducativo segun el articulo 69 del codigo penal y los 4 anos de la misma pena segun el articulo 233 del codigo penal contra las acusadas Laura Ling y Seung-eun Lee y les condeno finalmente a los 12 anos de igual pena segun el articulo 44 del codigo penal, respectivamente.
					
					Se declaro que el tiempo de condena se calcula a partir del dia 22 de marzo del 2009 cuando las acusadas fueron detenidas y a estas no se les permite apelar sobre el fallo.
					
					Las criminales reconocieron y aceptaron la sentencia.
					
					La RPDC esta tomando precaucion de que EE.UU. causo este acto criminal contra la primera.

articles.title: Pyongyaneses condenan "resolucion de sancion" de Consejo de Seguridad
articles.content:
Pyongyaneses condenan "resolucion de sancion" de Consejo de Seguridad
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los capitalinos para condenar la "resolucion de sancion" fabricada en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a instigacion de Estados Unidos.
					  Al conclave asistieron mas de 100 mil, entre otros, los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					 Al hacer uso de la palabra, el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, menciono que a instigacion de EE.UU., el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU volvio a hacer la grave provocacion de inventar finalmente la "resolucion de sancion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pretextando la segunda prueba nuclear de esta.
					
					 Prosiguio que esto deviene en su esencia una vil ofensiva de presion de los imperialistas norteamericanos para desvirtuar nuestra idea y derrocar nuestro regimen desarmandonos y asfixiandonos economicamente.
					
					  Resulta tambien un acto grosero y criminal que insulto insoportablemente la dignidad del pueblo coreano y violo gravemente la soberania de la RPDC, denuncio.
					
					 Hasta la fecha, la RPDC viene haciendo todo lo que se proponia a pesar de las continuas "sanciones" de las fuerzas aliadas imperialistas y su poderio estatal se ha incrementado lejos de debilitarse, apunto.
					
					  Esta realidad demuestra claramente que no vale la pena cualquier campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC con que los enemigos intentan ridicula y neciamente atropellar a la RPDC, afirmo.
					
					  Si las fuerzas hostiles siguen recurriendo obstinadamente a las maniobras de sancion y aplastamiento malinterpretando como supuesta "tactica de llevar la situacion al borde del barranco" la posicion intransigente de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, sufriran mayor fracaso y derrota, advirtio.
					
					  Por muy tenaces que fueran las maniobras de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles para aislar y bloquear a la RPDC, esta digna portadora de armas nucleares no vacilara ni un comino, sentencio.
					
					  Si los enemigos intentan neciamente bloquear a nuestro pais, les responderemos con el golpe resuelto y aniquilador considerandolo como acto belico, enfatizo.
					
					  Marcharemos a pasos firmes por la senda de independencia optada por nosotros mismos sin hacer caso de que haya o no los flancos y la asistencia internacional y alcanzaremos la victoria final en la confrontacion con EE.UU., concluyo.
					
					  El viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Pak Jae Gyong, quien intervino en representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, condeno categoricamente la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU tildandola de grave acto provocativo que viola e insulta flagrantemente la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC y su pueblo.
					
					  Advirtio que el ejercito popular destruira despiadadamente con un fuerte contraataque cualquier intento de interceptar, registrar, averiguar y bloquear cualquier embarcacion u objeto bajo la jurisdiccion de la RPDC.
					
					 Dado que el Acuerdo de Armisticio perdio su fuerza de restriccion legal y la RPDC entro en el estado de guerra con los imperialistas norteamericanos, el ejercito popular ejercera el derecho al ataque preventivo frente a la mas minima provocacion de los enemigos para asaltar los puntos vulnerables de EE.UU. y exterminar a todas las tropas agresoras norteamericanas enclavadas en cualesquier partes del planeta.
					
					 Los militaristas japoneses, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y otras fuerzas seguidoras de EE.UU. deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que seran castigados implacablemente por nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias si siguen actuando insensatamente. 
					
					  En ese acto multitudinario se escucharon tambien los discursos de los delegados de la clase obrera, el campesinado, la intelectualidad, la juventud y el estudiantado.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento a ejecucion de declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento a ejecucion de declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el Comite Norteno, el Sureno y el ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la misma declaracion publicaron el dia 15 el llamamiento conjunto.
					  La publicacion de esa declaracion intercoreana devino un acontecimiento historico en que todos los coreanos se comprometieron a la vista del mundo a dar inicio a la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica y a la nueva historia de la reunificacion y la prosperidad dando punto final a la historia de division de confrontacion de mas de medio siglo.
					
					  En octubre de 2007, se celebro la segunda cumbre Norte-Sur y se adopto la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que aclaro en detalles el camino al desarrollo de las relaciones N-S, la paz y la prosperidad a base del espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Hoy en dia, debido al desafio de las fuerzas separatistas que intentan impedir el avance de la historia, quedaron denegadas las declaraciones conjuntas, se ven amenazados gravemente los valiosos frutos de ellas y se agudiza la confrontacion militar.
					
					  Todos los coreanos en el interior y el exterior del pais deben implementar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, preservar la paz rechazando la confrontacion y la guerra y unirse en uno bajo la bandera de esos documentos.
					
					  Declaramos como el "periodo del movimiento por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre" el intervalo entre ambas fechas en que fueron aprobados estos documentos historicos.
					
					  Debemos frustrar exhaustivamente las maniobras de aumento armamentista y de guerra de las fuerzas belicistas anti-reunificacion que incrementan el peligro de guerra en el territorio patrio.
					
					  !Libremos dinamicamente el movimiento masivo contra las acciones hostiles de Japon y sus maniobras para resucitar el militarismo con motivo del 64o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, el 80o aniversario del Incidente Estudiantil de Kwangju, el 99o aniversario de la fabricacion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" y otras efemerides!
					
					  !Superemos las dificultades actuales unidos firmemente por encima de las diferencias de fracciones politicas, sectores, regiones y afiliaciones e demos buen impulso a la epoca del 15 de Junio!
					
					  !Levantemonos todos en la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas con el optimismo y la conviccion de la reconciliacion, la paz, la reunificacion y la prosperidad de la nacion!
					
					 En el proximo ano se acogera el decenario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					 Todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais deben celebrar significativamente esa fecha con la orgullosa victoria del movimiento patriotico por la reunificacion.

articles.title: CRC denuncia a Lee Myung Bak por impedir la visita a Pyongyang
articles.content:
CRC denuncia a Lee Myung Bak por impedir la visita a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que recientemente, el traidor Lee Myung Bak cometio otra accion fascista al desautorizar la visita a Pyongyang del grupo de peregrinacion "Ochetuji" que iba a realizar una misa por la reunificacion en el Templo Pohyon del monte Myohyang con motivo del 9o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el Consejo de Religiosos de Corea (CRC) hizo publica el dia 16 la declaracion.
					Condenamos categoricamente a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak calificandola de la horda de Satanas, que en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas impide la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, agudiza la confrontacion fratricida y convierte la sociedad surcoreana en la tierra inhabitable y esteril para la democracia y los DDHH.
					
					La peregrinacion "Ochetuji", que vinieron realizando los clerigos del "Cuerpo Nacional de Sacerdotes Catolicos por la Realizacion de la Justicia", la "Solidaridad del Ambiente Budista" y los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores, se trata de una forma de protesta contra la inaguantable realidad de la sociedad surcoreana en que debido a la banda de Lee, la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de Junio fue bloqueada completamente, la justicia, la democracia y el patriotismo son suprimidos por la dictadura y se torna cada dia mas depauperada la vida del pueblo.
					
					La desautorizacion de la visita del grupo de peregrinacion a Pyongyang integrado por los religiosos, quienes luchan mediante sus patrioticas actividades religiosas, demuestra claramente que la pandilla de Lee piensa solo en mantener su reaccionario y conservador "poder" practicando la dictadura fascista sin tomar en consideracion el destino del pais y la nacion ni la existencia de los connacionales ni la paz.
					
					No se puede apaciguar nunca la tempestad que va a castigar duro y acabar con la camarilla de Lee, que infligio a los compatriotas indecibles calamidades y desgracias cometiendo unicamente fechorias contra la nacion y el pueblo desde su llegada al poder.
					
					Estamos convencidos de que los religiosos surcoreanos libraran dinamicamente la gigantesca lucha por barrer lo mas pronto posible a la banda traidora de Lee y escribir la nueva historia de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad dando continuidad a la tradicion de ponerse en la cabeza del movimiento por la justicia, la verdad, la paz y la reunificacion.
